title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2404/87 of 6 August 1987 amending for the 17th time Regulation (EEC) No 1371/84 as regards the quantity of milk used as the basis for calculating the additional levy
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2404/87
of 6 August 1987
amending for the 17th time Regulation (EEC) No 1371/84 as regards the quantity of milk used as the basis for calculating the additional levy
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the first and second subparagraphs of Article 9 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1371/84, the figure '0,26 %' is replaced by '0,21 %'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication of the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from the second six months of the third period of application of the additional levy.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 August 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
